quote: Knowing it and seeing it are two different things.
author: Suzanne Collins,  Mockingjay

quote: On Knowledge: You know that I know you know, but I want you to know that I know you know I know you know I know. It’s important for you to know that, you know?
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: To be too knowing is a downfall.
author: Laura Linney

quote: Everything I know, I know because of love.
author: Leo Tolstoy,  War and Peace

quote: You know that I know you know, but I want you to know that I know you know I know you know I know. It’s important for you to know that, you know?
author: Jarod Kintz,  The Days of Yay are Here! Wake Me Up When They're Over.

quote: We understand more than we know.
author: Margaret Atwood,  Oryx and Crake

quote: There is a long time in me between knowing and telling.
author: Grace Paley,  Enormous Changes at the Last Minute

quote: I do not know everything; still many things I understand.
author: Madeleine L'Engle,  A Wrinkle in Time

quote: Write what you know.
author: Mark Twain,  The Adventures of Tom Sawyer & Adventures of Huckleberry Finn

quote: I knew it, but I knew you didn’t know I knew it, so I knew to not let you know I knew it by acting like I didn’t know it.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Title is Invisible

quote: I only know that I know nothing
author: Socrates

quote: Knowledge is love and light and vision.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Knowledge, like all things, is best in moderation,"intoned the Will. "Knowing everything means you don't need to think, and that is very dangerous.
author: Garth Nix,  Lady Friday

quote: I knew in that moment that I was full of it. I didn't know who I was. I only knew my routine. I knew who I was suppose to be, who I was expected to be.
author: Stacie Hammond,  Ana J. Awakens

quote: To know that we know what we know, and to know that we do not know what we do not know, that is true knowledge.
author: Nicolaus Copernicus

quote: Knowledge is the food of the soul.
author: Plato

quote: A man who knows what other men know,know nothing for they all know the same
author: Alchemist

quote: Everybody gets told to write about what they know. The trouble with many of us is that at the earlier stages of life we think we know everything- or to put it more usefully, we are often unaware of the scope and structure of our ignorance.
author: Thomas Pynchon,  Slow Learner: Early Stories

quote: There is no knowing that does not begin with knowing God.
author: John Calvin

quote: All knowledge hurts.
author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones

quote: The public have an insatiable curiosity to know everything, except what is worth knowing.
author: Oscar Wilde,  The Soul of Man Under Socialism, and Selected Critical Prose

quote: You know you made it, when people you know, tell people they know, that you know them.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Knowledge is not made for understanding; it is made for cutting.
author: Michel Foucault

quote: Knowing is not enough. You must accept My blessings in order to attain a better life. You must embrace a higher level of consciousness.
author: Mary B. Morrison

quote: Learning is not the accumulation of knowledge, but rather, one thing only: understanding
author: Donna Jo Napoli

quote: Knowing was a temptation. What you don't know won't tempt you.
author: Margaret Atwood,  The Handmaid's Tale

quote: All knowledge is worth having.
author: Jacqueline Carey,  Kushiel's Dart

quote: I learned very early the difference between knowing the name of something and knowing something.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: A little knowledge is a dangerous thing. So is a lot.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: ... there is no shame in not knowing. The problem arises when irrational thought and attendant behavior fill the vacuum left by ignorance.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson,  The Sky Is Not the Limit: Adventures of an Urban Astrophysicist

quote: People don't care how much you know until they know how much you care
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Whenever we proceed from the known into the unknown we may hope to understand, but we may have to learn at the same time a new meaning of the word 'understanding.
author: Werner Heisenberg,  Physics and Philosophy: The Revolution in Modern Science

quote: Keenly seek knowledge.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: People don't want to know. They have to be made to know. Whether they act on what they know is up to them. But they have to know.
author: Anthony Burgess,  Earthly Powers

quote: It's what we think we know that keeps us from learning.
author: Claude Bernard

quote: Everybody’s gotta learn, nobody’s born knowing.
author: Harper Lee

quote: True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: All we know is what we're told.
author: Ashly Lorenzana

quote: There is nothing so minute or inconsiderable that I would not rather know it than not know it.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Knowledge is knowing the depth of the ocean. Wisdom is knowing till where to swim.
author: Saleem Sharma

quote: I only know everything if you ask the right questions.
author: Doc Coleman

quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
author: Aristotle

quote: I don't write about what I know: I write in order to find out what I know.
author: Patricia Hampl

quote: When I wanted to know something, I wanted it undistorted by somebody else's imperfect knowledge.
author: Milton H. Erickson

quote: Knowledge is the eye that must direct the foot of obedience.
author: Thomas Watson

quote: Those who don't know must learn from those who do.
author: Plato,  The Republic

quote: You don’t know anything, but I know even less.
author: Dejan Stojanovic,  The Sun Watches the Sun

quote: Knowledgeable [10w] The knowledgeable man inventoried and catalogued everything he doesn't know.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: If you don't know everything, you must go on with what you do know.
author: Robert Jordan,  A Crown of Swords

quote: An exercise in unknowing is not the same as not knowing or forgetting.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the best book I've ever written, and it still sucks
